links.rel: Zoom - Mass-deploying with preconfigured settings for macOS - Documentation Link. Requirements for using the zoom IT admin installer

DisableDaemonInstall.title: DisableDaemonInstall
DisableDaemonInstall.description: Controls the use of the daemon helper to install updates, which bypasses the need to enter admin credentials when upgrading. This option requires AutoUpdate option to be enabled, and will fail if not enabled.

SetEnrollToken4CloudMDM.title: SetEnrollToken4CloudMDM, token
SetEnrollToken4CloudMDM.description: Enroll your device into Zoom Device Management with a token provided from the web portal.

DisableZoomOnboarding.title: DisableZoomOnboarding
DisableZoomOnboarding.description: Disables the onboarding experience displayed the first time the Zoom desktop app is installed. (0) - Allow onboarding experience. (1) - Disable onboarding experience.

DisableDiscoverWhatsNew.title: DisableDiscoverWhatsNew
DisableDiscoverWhatsNew.description: Disables the What's New window, which highlights new features and enhancements for the desktop app version currently installed.

EnableCaptureObjByPicker.title: EnableCaptureObjByPicker
EnableCaptureObjByPicker.description: Allows the MacOS System Picker to capture screen and audio content

EnableDiagnostic.title: EnableDiagnostic
EnableDiagnostic.description: Controls the ability for the desktop app to access the Network Connectivity Tool, which allows a user to test their network connection with Zoom services.

BlockUntrustedSSLCert.title: BlockUntrustedSSLCert
BlockUntrustedSSLCert.description: Block connections to untrusted SSL certificates.

ProxyPAC, your_pac_url.title: ProxyPAC, your_pac_url
ProxyPAC, your_pac_url.description: Set proxy server for desktop app with PAC URL.

ProxyServer.title: ProxyServer, proxy_address
ProxyServer.description: Set a proxy server for desktop app as named proxy. Example: server: port

ProxyBypass.title: ProxyBypass, bypass_rule
ProxyBypass.description: Set proxy bypass rule for the desktop app.

DisableSharingOverProxy.title: DisableSharingOverProxy
DisableSharingOverProxy.description: Prevent screen sharing traffic over proxies.

BandwidthLimitUp.title: BandwidthLimitUp
BandwidthLimitUp.description: Set maximum sending bandwidth for the desktop app. Note: If bandwidth is restricted through web settings, the web restrictions override restrictions set in the client.  (all values in Kbps)

BandwidthLimitDown.title: BandwidthLimitDown
BandwidthLimitDown.description: Set maximum receiving bandwidth for the desktop app.Note: If bandwidth is restricted through web settings, the web restrictions override restrictions set in the client. (all values in Kbps)

IgnoreBandwidthLimits.title: IgnoreBandwidthLimits
IgnoreBandwidthLimits.description: Ignore bandwidth limit set on web settings. (Useful for exceptions to bandwidth restrictions)

EnableIndependentDataPort.title: EnableIndependentDataPort
EnableIndependentDataPort.description: If enabled, the client will use the following ports for media transmission: Audio: 8803 Screen share: 8802 Video: 8801

DisableDirectConnection2Web.title: DisableDirectConnection2Web
DisableDirectConnection2Web.description: Disable all direct connections to Zoom web service.

DisableP2PStunTraffic.title: DisableP2PStunTraffic
DisableP2PStunTraffic.description: Disable P2P STUN traffic from the Zoom app. This traffic is the Zoom app checking if admin web settings allow for P2P meetings on the network.

DisableMultipleAccountsSwitch.title: DisableMultipleAccountsSwitch
DisableMultipleAccountsSwitch.description: Disable the ability for users to be signed-in to multiple accounts and easily switch between them. If disabled, users must manually sign out and then sign in to another account.

EnableAppleLogin.title: EnableAppleLogin
EnableAppleLogin.description: Allow access to Apple login option.

DisableUserSignUp.title: DisableUserSignUp
DisableUserSignUp.description: Disable the Sign Up option on the Zoom app, which would otherwise be displayed with Join a Meeting and Sign In options upon opening the Zoom app.

DisableKeepSignedInWithSSO.title: DisableKeepSignedInWithSSO
DisableKeepSignedInWithSSO.description: Require fresh SSO login upon client start.

DisableKeepSignedInWithGoogle.title: DisableKeepSignedInWithGoogle
DisableKeepSignedInWithGoogle.description: Require fresh Google login upon client start.

DisableKeepSignedInWithFacebook.title: DisableKeepSignedInWithFacebook
DisableKeepSignedInWithFacebook.description: Require fresh Facebook login upon client start.

KeepSignedIn.title: KeepSignedIn
KeepSignedIn.description: Keep the user signed in to the client when relaunched. (Email login only)

zSSOHost.title: zSSOHost
zSSOHost.description: Set the default SSO URL for SSO login. For example, hooli.zoom.us would be set as zSSOHost=hooli.

ForceSSOURL.title: ForceSSOURL
ForceSSOURL.description: Set and lock the default SSO URL for SSO login. For example, hooli.zoom.us would be set as ForceSSOUrl=hooli.

EnableEmbedBrowserForSSO.title: EnableEmbedBrowserForSSO
EnableEmbedBrowserForSSO.description: Use embedded browser in the client for SSO.

SetWebDomain.title: SetWebDomain
SetWebDomain.description: Sets the web domain for logging in or joining a meeting. By default, the value is https://zoom.us or https://zoom.com.

DisableAutoLaunchSSO.title: DisableAutoLaunchSSO
DisableAutoLaunchSSO.description: Prevent Zoom from automatically launching the previously used SSO URL. This is useful for users with multiple accounts, each having their own SSO URL.

EnablePhoneLogin.title: EnablePhoneLogin
EnablePhoneLogin.description: Enables login with phone authentication.  - This options is  only available for devices in the China region.

Account, your account ID.title: Account, your account ID
Account, your account ID.description: Restrict the client to only join meetings hosted by the specified account IDs.  - Please have an account admin or owner contact Zoom Support to acquire your account ID.

Login_Domain.title: Login_Domain
Login_Domain.description: Set the email address domain that users can login with, each separated by &. Example: zoom.us & hooli.com Note: The & must be entered as an escape character &, or use CDATA to wrap the entire string. This only applies to plist mass deployment.

EnableCloudSwitch.title: EnableCloudSwitch
EnableCloudSwitch.description: Enable the option to switch between Zoom commercial (default) and Zoom for Gov.

EnforceSignInToJoin.title: EnforceSignInToJoin
EnforceSignInToJoin.description: Require users to be authenticated before joining a meeting with the desktop app. Authentication can take place through the the web portal, if joining through join URL. Note: This policy will interfere with joining meetings and webinars hosted by Zoom for Government (ZfG) accounts, unless the OverrideEnforceSigninIntercloud policy is enabled as well.

EnforceAppSignInToJoin.title: EnforceAppSignInToJoin
EnforceAppSignInToJoin.description: Require authentication on the desktop app to join any meeting on the desktop app. Note: This policy will interfere with joining meetings and webinars hosted by Zoom for Government (ZfG) accounts, unless the OverrideEnforceSigninIntercloud policy is enabled as well.

EnforceSignInToJoinForWebinar.title: EnforceSignInToJoinForWebinar
EnforceSignInToJoinForWebinar.description: Require users to be authenticated before joining a webinar with the desktop app. Authentication can take place through the the web portal, if joining through join URL. Note: This policy will interfere with joining webinars hosted by Zoom for Government (ZfG) accounts, unless the OverrideEnforceSigninIntercloud policy is enabled as well.

EnforceAppSignInToJoinForWebinar.title: EnforceAppSignInToJoinForWebinar
EnforceAppSignInToJoinForWebinar.description: Require authentication on the desktop app to join any webinar on the desktop app. Note: This policy will interfere with joining webinars hosted by Zoom for Government (ZfG) accounts, unless the OverrideEnforceSigninIntercloud policy is enabled as well.

SetDevicePolicyToken, device_token.title: SetDevicePolicyToken, device_token
SetDevicePolicyToken, device_token.description: Require internal meeting authentication.  - Please have an account admin or owner contact Zoom Support to have this enabled for use. The owner will also need to edit a role to have view/edit access to Device Policy Management. The required token can then be retrieved from the Device Policy Management page.

EnableNewSigninUI.title: EnableNewSigninUI
EnableNewSigninUI.description: When a signed-out user opens the Zoom Workplace app, they will see the enhanced workplace interface with tabs that reflect Zoom products. Upon signing in, users will only see the products available to them.

FullScreenWhenJoin.title: FullScreenWhenJoin
FullScreenWhenJoin.description: When starting or joining a meeting, the meeting window will enter full-screen.

AutoHideToolBar.title: AutoHideToolBar
AutoHideToolBar.description: Set use of Always show meeting controls setting.

EnableAutoCopyConfInvitationURL.title: EnableAutoCopyConfInvitationURL
EnableAutoCopyConfInvitationURL.description: Enables the Copy invite link when starting a meeting option found within General app settings.

DefaultUsePortraitView.title: DefaultUsePortraitView
DefaultUsePortraitView.description: Default to Portrait Mode upon opening Zoom.

DisableClosedCaptioning.title: DisableClosedCaptioning
DisableClosedCaptioning.description: Disable the use of all captioning.

DisableManualClosedCaptioning.title: DisableManualClosedCaptioning
DisableManualClosedCaptioning.description: Disable the use of manual and third-party captioning. This does not affect automated captioning.

DisableAssignTypist.title: DisableAssignTypist
DisableAssignTypist.description: Disable the ability for users to assign a participant the role of manually entering captions. This does not affect the use of automated captions or captions provided by a third-party service.

DisableQnA.title: DisableQnA
DisableQnA.description: Disable the use of Q&A in webinars.

DisableMeetingReactions.title: DisableMeetingReactions
DisableMeetingReactions.description: Disable the use of Meeting reactions.

DisableNonVerbalFeedback.title: DisableNonVerbalFeedback
DisableNonVerbalFeedback.description: Disable the use of Non-verbal feedback.

DisableWebinarReactions.title: DisableWebinarReactions
DisableWebinarReactions.description: Disable the use of Webinar Reactions.

DisableSideCar.title: DisableSideCar
DisableSideCar.description: Disable the use of Webinar Resources, which allows webinar hosts with the ability to link to external resources, such as newsletter sign-ups, learn more pages, and others.

DisableBroadcastBOMessage.title: DisableBroadcastBOMessage
DisableBroadcastBOMessage.description: Disable the ability for the host to broadcast a message to all open breakout rooms.

ShowConnectedTime.title: ShowConnectedTime
ShowConnectedTime.description: Enable the Show Meeting Timers setting. This setting allows for viewing the current duration of the meeting, or the remaining time, based on scheduled duration.

MuteWhenLockScreen.title: MuteWhenLockScreen
MuteWhenLockScreen.description: Automatically mute the microphone and turn off video, when the screen is locked during a meeting.

EnableRemindMeetingTime.title: EnableRemindMeetingTime
EnableRemindMeetingTime.description: Display reminder notifications for upcoming meetings.

DisableInMeetingZoomNotes.title: DisableInMeetingZoomNotes
DisableInMeetingZoomNotes.description: Disables the use of Zoom Notes during meetings.

KeepMeetingOnTop.title: KeepMeetingOnTop
KeepMeetingOnTop.description: Keep meeting on top of other apps.

AU2_Update3rdStorageUrl.title: AU2_Update3rdStorageUrl
AU2_Update3rdStorageUrl.description: Set a local storage url for update. This policy depends on AU2_DeploySpecificVersion, if AU2_DeploySpecificVersion is empty, AU2_Update3rdStorageUrl will not work. If installation package can be downloaded through such a link: http://127.0.0.1/x64_ZoomInstallerFull.msi, this string should be http://127.0.0.1.

DisableSmartMeetingSummaries.title: DisableSmartMeetingSummaries
DisableSmartMeetingSummaries.description: Disable the in-meeting toolbar option for Meeting Summary. If disabled, users will not be able see or interact with the AI Companion feature, but their audio will still be transcribed and available for questions by others.

DisableAICQueries.title: DisableAICQueries
DisableAICQueries.description: Disable the in-meeting toolbar option for AI Companion. If disabled, users will not be able see or interact with the AI Companion feature, but their audio will still be transcribed and available for questions by others.

zDisableVideo.title: zDisableVideo
zDisableVideo.description: Automatically turn off camera when joining a meeting.

EnableMirrorEffect.title: EnableMirrorEffect
EnableMirrorEffect.description: Enable mirroring of your video. Mirror effect only affects your view of your video.

HideSelfView.title: HideSelfView
HideSelfView.description: Controls the use of the Hide Self View option.

SetFaceBeautyValue.title: SetFaceBeautyValue
SetFaceBeautyValue.description: Used in conjunction with EnableFaceBeauty, this allows you to set the exact intensity of the Touch up my appearance filter.

EnableLightAdaption.title: EnableLightAdaption
EnableLightAdaption.description: Enable Adjust for low-light video setting.

EnableAutoLightAdaption.title: EnableAutoLightAdaption
EnableAutoLightAdaption.description: Set mode of adjusting low-light video feature. This is dependent on the EnableLightAdaption option: 1 - Auto, 0 - Manual

SetLightAdaptionManualValue.title: SetLightAdaptionManualValue
SetLightAdaptionManualValue.description: Used in conjunction with EnableLightAdaption, this allows you to set the exact intensity of the low-light adjustment.

AlwaysShowVideoPreviewDialog.title: AlwaysShowVideoPreviewDialog
AlwaysShowVideoPreviewDialog.description: Always show the video preview when joining a meeting.

EnableSpotlightSelf.title: EnableSpotlightSelf
EnableSpotlightSelf.description: Show self as the active speaker when speaking.

Enable49Video.title: Enable49Video
Enable49Video.description: Set max number of participants displayed in Gallery View to 49 participants per screen.

VideoRenderMethod.title: VideoRenderMethod
VideoRenderMethod.description: Set the video rendering method: 0 - Auto 1 - Direct3D11 Flip Mode 2 - Direct3D11 3 - Direct3D9 4 - GDI

DisableComputerAudio.title: DisableComputerAudio
DisableComputerAudio.description: Disable and remove the Computer Audio from the meeting audio options.

ZCCMsgAudioSetting.title: ZCCMsgAudioSetting
ZCCMsgAudioSetting.description: Setting up message notifications for Zoom Contact Center

AudioAutoAdjust.title: AudioAutoAdjust
AudioAutoAdjust.description: Enable Automatically adjust microphone volume audio setting.

SetSuppressBackgroundNoiseLevel.title: SetSuppressBackgroundNoiseLevel
SetSuppressBackgroundNoiseLevel.description: Disables the What's New window, which highlights new features and enhancements for the desktop app version currently installed: 0 - Auto, 1- Low, 2 - Medium, 3 - High

EnableOriginalSound.title: EnableOriginalSound
EnableOriginalSound.description: Enable the Original sound for musicians audio profile for the meeting audio input.

zAutoJoinVoip.title: zAutoJoinVoip
zAutoJoinVoip.description: Automatically connect audio with computer audio when joining a meeting.

MuteVoipWhenJoin.title: MuteVoipWhenJoin
MuteVoipWhenJoin.description: Mute computer audio microphone when joining a meeting.

EnableHIDControl.title: EnableHIDControl
EnableHIDControl.description: Enables control of USB devices by the Zoom client. This correlates to the Sync buttons on headset option within app Audio settings.

DisableScreenShare.title: DisableScreenShare
DisableScreenShare.description: Disable the ability to share your screen in meetings and webinars. Note: This does not disable incoming screen sharing from other participants.

zAutoFullScreenWhenViewShare.title: zAutoFullScreenWhenViewShare
zAutoFullScreenWhenViewShare.description: When viewing shared content, the content window automatically goes fullscreen.

zAutoFitWhenViewShare.title: zAutoFitWhenViewShare
zAutoFitWhenViewShare.description: When viewing shared content, the content window automatically adjusts to fit the viewer's screen.

zDisableAnnotation.title: zDisableAnnotation
zDisableAnnotation.description: Disable and remove the ability to annotate over shared screen.

EnableShareAudio.title: EnableShareAudio
EnableShareAudio.description: Enable the Share computer audio option when sharing.

EnableShareVideo.title: EnableShareVideo
EnableShareVideo.description: Enable the Optimize for video clip option when sharing.

DisableInMeetingWhiteBoard.title: DisableInMeetingWhiteBoard
DisableInMeetingWhiteBoard.description: Disable the Zoom Whiteboard feature in meetings and webinars.

DisableDesktopShare.title: DisableDesktopShare
DisableDesktopShare.description: Disable the option to share your desktop when screen sharing.

zRemoteControllAllApp.title: zRemoteControllAllApp
zRemoteControllAllApp.description: Allow remote control of all applications.

EnableShareClipboardWhenRemoteControl.title: EnableShareClipboardWhenRemoteControl
EnableShareClipboardWhenRemoteControl.description: Allow clipboard access during remote control.

PresentInMeetingOption.title: PresentInMeetingOption
PresentInMeetingOption.description: Set sharing option when sharing your screen within a meeting: 0 - Show all sharing options, 1 - Automatically share desktop

EnableDoNotDisturbInSharing.title: EnableDoNotDisturbInSharing
EnableDoNotDisturbInSharing.description: Silence system notifications when sharing desktop.

LegacyCaptureMode.title: LegacyCaptureMode
LegacyCaptureMode.description: Disable Hardware Acceleration for Screen Sharing under Share Screen > Advanced.

SetScreenCaptureMode.title: SetScreenCaptureMode
SetScreenCaptureMode.description: Set the screen capture mode: 0 - Auto, 1 - Legacy operating systems, 2 - Capture with window filtering, 3 - Advanced share with window filtering, 4 - Advanced share without window filtering, 5 - Secure share with window filtering

EnableHardwareOptimizeVideoSharing.title: EnableHardwareOptimizeVideoSharing
EnableHardwareOptimizeVideoSharing.description: Enable Hardware Acceleration for Video Sharing under Share Screen > Advanced.

HidePhoneInComingCallWhileInMeeting.title: HidePhoneInComingCallWhileInMeeting
HidePhoneInComingCallWhileInMeeting.description: Prevent incoming call notifications while in a meeting.

EnableLaunchApp4IncomingCalls.title: EnableLaunchApp4IncomingCalls
EnableLaunchApp4IncomingCalls.description: Control the Launch an external app or a URL for incoming calls option in the client. This must be used in coordination with SetCommand4IncomingCalls, so that the URL can be configured as well.

SetCommand4IncomingCalls.title: SetCommand4IncomingCalls
SetCommand4IncomingCalls.description: Set the URL used when the client receives an incoming call. This must be used in coordination with EnableLaunchApp4IncomingCalls.

ClickToCallDefault.title: ClickToCallDefault
ClickToCallDefault.description: Choose which Zoom service is used when clicking a phone number to place a call: 0 - Zoom Phone, 1 - Zoom Contact Center

zDisableFT.title: zDisableFT
zDisableFT.description: Disable in-meeting file transfer. (sending or receiving)

DisableZoomAppsGuestAccess.title: DisableZoomAppsGuestAccess
DisableZoomAppsGuestAccess.description: Control the ability for users to utilize a Zoom App in Guest mode.

RecordPath, your_recording_path.title: RecordPath, your_recording_path
RecordPath, your_recording_path.description: Set the default recording location for local recordings.

zDisableLocalRecord.title: zDisableLocalRecord
zDisableLocalRecord.description: Disable recording locally on the device.

NotifyCMRAvailable.title: NotifyCMRAvailable
NotifyCMRAvailable.description: Control the desktop app setting Show notifications when a new recording is available.

DisableDirectShare.title: DisableDirectShare
DisableDirectShare.description: Disable direct share with Zoom Rooms option.

EnableStartMeetingWithRoomSystem.title: EnableStartMeetingWithRoomSystem
EnableStartMeetingWithRoomSystem.description: Display the Call Room System button on the home screen of the desktop app.

PresentToRoomWithAudio.title: PresentToRoomWithAudio
PresentToRoomWithAudio.description: Share sound when screen sharing to a Zoom Room.

PresentToRoomOptimizeVideo.title: PresentToRoomOptimizeVideo
PresentToRoomOptimizeVideo.description: Optimize screen sharing for video clip when sharing to a Zoom Room.

PresentToRoomOption.title: PresentToRoomOption
PresentToRoomOption.description: Set sharing option when sharing to a Zoom Room: 0 - Show all sharing options, 1 - Automatically share desktop

KeepOnlyOneSectionOpenInChat.title: KeepOnlyOneSectionOpenInChat
KeepOnlyOneSectionOpenInChat.description: Controls the state of the Only allow one section opened at a time setting for the desktop app, found under the Team Chat section of app settings.

SeparateIMChatAndChannel.title: SeparateIMChatAndChannel
SeparateIMChatAndChannel.description: Controls the state of the Organize by section setting for the desktop app, found under the Team Chat section of app settings.

SetMessengerDoNotDropThread.title: SetMessengerDoNotDropThread
SetMessengerDoNotDropThread.description: Move messages with new replies to the bottom of the chat/channel.

MessageNotificationPreference.title: MessageNotificationPreference
MessageNotificationPreference.description: Setting up message notifications preferences for Team Chat.: 0 - All messages, 1 - Direct messages, mentions, and replies, 2 - Off

ShowUnreadCountForChannel.title: ShowUnreadCountForChannel
ShowUnreadCountForChannel.description: Show unread message count for channels.

ShowUnreadCountForMeetingChat.title: ShowUnreadCountForMeetingChat
ShowUnreadCountForMeetingChat.description: Show unread message count for meeting chats.

UnreadViewOrder.title: UnreadViewOrder
UnreadViewOrder.description: Where to start when viewing unread messages in a channel. 0 - Start at the first unread message 1 - Start at the latest unread message

enum_titles: 0 - Start at the first unread message
1 - Start at the latest unread message

eceiveNotificationsByKeyword.title: ReceiveNotificationsByKeyword
eceiveNotificationsByKeyword.description: Setting keywords as the basis for triggering message notifications.

ShowProfilePhotosInChat.title: ShowProfilePhotosInChat
ShowProfilePhotosInChat.description: Controls if user profile pictures are shown in Zoom Chat.

ShowVoiceMessageButton.title: ShowVoiceMessageButton
ShowVoiceMessageButton.description: Allow use of the Send audio message option.

ShowVideoMessageButton.title: ShowVideoMessageButton
ShowVideoMessageButton.description: Allow use of the Send video message option.

PlaySoundForIMMessage.title: PlaySoundForIMMessage
PlaySoundForIMMessage.description: Play audio notifications when an IM message is received.

ShowIMMessagePreview.title: ShowIMMessagePreview
ShowIMMessagePreview.description: Allow message previews in system notifications when a chat message is received.

MuteIMNotificationWhenInMeeting.title: MuteIMNotificationWhenInMeeting
MuteIMNotificationWhenInMeeting.description: Mute chat system notifications when in a meeting.

DisableIMFileTransfer.title: DisableIMFileTransfer
DisableIMFileTransfer.description: Restricts the ability of users to send files through Team Chat, except for any domains provided in the AllowedIMFileTransferDomain policy.

AllowedIMFileTransferDomain.title: AllowedIMFileTransferDomain
AllowedIMFileTransferDomain.description: Allows admins to specify domains that are allowed to send files through Team Chat when the DisableIMFileTransfer policy is enabled. Multiple domains can be separated by an &, for example: Domain1.com&Domain2.com Note: If the DisableIMFileTransfer policy is enabled and no domains are specified through this policy, file transfers through Team Chat are entirely disabled for all domains.

PreferredLanguage.title: PreferredLanguage
PreferredLanguage.description: Preferred Language - Use this language when translating messages

EmbedUserAgentString.title: EmbedUserAgentString
EmbedUserAgentString.description: Embed a specified user agent string for all HTTP requests from Zoom client.

EmbedDeviceTag.title: EmbedDeviceTag
EmbedDeviceTag.description: Embed a specified device tag string for all HTTP requests from Zoom client application. This string will be appended to the head of the regular HTTP requests.

OverrideEnforceSigninIntercloud.title: OverrideEnforceSigninIntercloud
OverrideEnforceSigninIntercloud.description: Override the following policies to allow users to join a Zoom meeting or webinar hosted on the Zoom for Government Cloud (ZfG Cloud) without the need to authenticate: EnforceSignInToJoin EnforceAppSignInToJoin EnforceSignInToJoinForWebinar EnforceAppSignInToJoinForWebinar

Intercloud_DisableAllFeatures.title: Intercloud_DisableAllFeatures
Intercloud_DisableAllFeatures.description: Disables all features except for audio and video for meetings hosted on the ZfG cloud.

Intercloud_DisableMeetingChat.title: Intercloud_DisableMeetingChat
Intercloud_DisableMeetingChat.description: Disables the use of in-meeting chat on meetings hosted on the ZfG Cloud.

Intercloud_DisableShareScreen.title: Intercloud_DisableShareScreen
Intercloud_DisableShareScreen.description: Disables the local ability to share screen on meetings hosted on the ZfG Cloud.This does not affect others' ability to shared content.

Intercloud_DisableMeetingReactions.title: Intercloud_DisableMeetingReactions
Intercloud_DisableMeetingReactions.description: Disables the use of meeting reactions on meetings hosted on the ZfG Cloud.

Intercloud_DisableMeetingFileTransfer.title: Intercloud_DisableMeetingFileTransfer
Intercloud_DisableMeetingFileTransfer.description: Disables the use of file transfers through in-meeting chat on meetings hosted on the ZfG Cloud.

Intercloud_DisableAnnotation.title: Intercloud_DisableAnnotation
Intercloud_DisableAnnotation.description: Disables the local ability to annotate on shared content in meetings hosted on the ZfG Cloud. This does not affect others' ability to annotate.

Intercloud_DisableWhiteBoard.title: Intercloud_DisableWhiteBoard
Intercloud_DisableWhiteBoard.description: Disables the use of in-meeting whiteboarding on meetings hosted on the ZfG Cloud.

Intercloud_DisableLocalRecording.title: Intercloud_DisableLocalRecording
Intercloud_DisableLocalRecording.description: Disabled by default, this option disables the ability to locally record meetings hosted on the ZfG Cloud.

Intercloud_DisableClosedCaptioning.title: Intercloud_DisableClosedCaptioning
Intercloud_DisableClosedCaptioning.description: Disabled by default, this option disables the use of captioning features on meetings hosted on the ZfG Cloud.

Intercloud_DisableRemoteControl.title: Intercloud_DisableRemoteControl
Intercloud_DisableRemoteControl.description: Disabled by default, this option disables the remote control of shared screens in meetings hosted on the ZfG Cloud.

Intercloud_DisableMeetingPolls.title: Intercloud_DisableMeetingPolls
Intercloud_DisableMeetingPolls.description: Disabled by default, this option disables the use of polling in meetings hosted on the ZfG Cloud.

Intercloud_DisableComputerAudio.title: Intercloud_DisableComputerAudio
Intercloud_DisableComputerAudio.description: Disabled by default, this option disables the use of computer audio for connecting to meetings hosted on the ZfG Cloud.

EnableMeshNetworking.title: EnableMeshNetworking
EnableMeshNetworking.description: Control client use of Zoom Mesh, even if deployed on your account and local network.

MeshMulticastIP.title: MeshMulticastIP
MeshMulticastIP.description: When utilizing Zoom Mesh, this policy allows admins to specify a valid IP address to be a UDP multicast IP for Zoom apps to declare themselves and detect each other in their local sub-network (255.255.255.0). Admins can choose other IP addresses within the range of [224.0.0.1, 239.255.255.255].

MeshMulticastPort.title: MeshMulticastPort
MeshMulticastPort.description: When utilizing Zoom Mesh, this policy allows an admin to specify a valid port to be used as the UDP multicast port to communicate with other Zoom Mesh nodes on the network.

MeshListenPortRange.title: MeshListenPortRange
MeshListenPortRange.description: When utilizing Zoom Mesh, this policy allows a valid port range to be used to set up listen sockets for connection requests between Mesh parents and children nodes. The nodes will also use this range to send signals and media data.

EnableGuestMesh.title: EnableGuestMesh
EnableGuestMesh.description: When utilizing Zoom Mesh, this policy allows users to join an external Webinar as a guest through another account's local Zoom Mesh-enabled network. Other requirements must be met, such as the device having the minimum supported client version for Mesh connections and the external account's associated account setting in the web portal also enabled.
